ComicInfo.Title: Welcome to New York!
ComicInfo.Summary:
We are introduced to a surviving New York City; the last city containing any resemblance to human society. Nate Hoss, a thug, is accosted by Gary the Gutterrat and gives chase across the roof tops.
Under the tomb of the unnamed soldier in Arlington cemetery our two survivors test their time machine and Kemp is sent forty years in to the future.
Nate catches up to Gutterrat and meets Kirby on top of a sky scraper.
Kemp notices that the life sensor he sent in to the future has sustained a beating and Chester, back in the past, wonders if he should pull Kemp back early.
